titles.title: A bill to exempt certain air taxi services from taxes on transportation by air.
A bill to exempt certain air taxi services from taxes on transportation by air.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt certain on-demand flights (flights for which the departure time, departure location, and arrival location are specifically negotiated with the customer) from the excise tax on transportation of persons and property by air.
